article_title: Bombardier Begins Running CSeries Jet Engines Again
article_text:
Bombardier Inc. began running the engines again on its new CSeries jet Tuesday, the first such tests since a major failure last month during routine ground maintenance that damaged one of its aircraft and grounded the test fleet.

Canadian transportation safety officials, Bombardier and engine maker United Technologies Corp. unit Pratt & Whitney have been investigating the May 29 failure that abruptly halted tests on its new jet...
